Class Course

java.lang.Object
Course
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Course>
public class Course extends Object implements Comparable<Course>
The Course class represents a specific educational course with attributes, used as the reference class for the CurriculumMonitoringApplication class to hold and manage information about courses.

  • Constructor Summary

      units - the number of units for the course

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Course another)
      Compares this Course object with the specified Course object based on grades. Returns a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified object.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Course>
      Parameters:
